scripts.startdev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev"  "cd frontend && npm run dev2" "node proxyserver.js"
scripts.fdev: concurrently   "cd frontend && npm run dev2" "node proxyserver.js"
scripts.bdev2: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev"   "node proxyserver.js"
scripts.startb: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:prod" "cd frontend && npm run build && npm run start" "node proxyserver.js"
